title.value: REDUCTION OF METAL ARTIFACTS IN 7T MRI FOR PRE-CLINICAL DIFFUSING ALPHA-EMITTING RADIATION THERAPY RECTAL STUDIES
title.justification: The title "REDUCTION OF METAL ARTIFACTS IN 7T MRI FOR PRE-CLINICAL DIFFUSING ALPHA-EMITTING RADIATION THERAPY RECTAL STUDIES" is explicitly mentioned in the provided paper text, making it the accurate title to extract.
title.quote: "REDUCTION OF METAL ARTIFACTS IN 7T MRI FOR PRE-CLINICAL DIFFUSING ALPHA-EMITTING RADIATION THERAPY RECTAL STUDIES Mélodie Cyr, Behnaz Behmand, Naim Chabaytah, Joud Babik, Shirin A. Enger McGill University, Montréal, QC"

extractions.description: The paper discusses a feasibility study for reducing metal artifacts in 7T MRI imaging of colorectal tumors in a pre-clinical setting using diffusing alpha-emitting radiation therapy (DaRT). It evaluates an orthotopic mouse model and MRI optimization techniques.

type.justification: The study involves empirical methods by conducting a feasibility study with direct experimentation on orthotopic models using real tumor cells and MRI imaging to reduce metal artifacts.
type.quote: "In this study, a feasibility study using tumours grown in the rectum of the mice through an orthotopic intra-rectal injection of colorectal adenocarcinoma cells, was studied..."

name.justification: The research focuses on optimizing 7T MRI imaging techniques to reduce metal artifacts, which falls squarely under the field of Medical Imaging.
name.quote: "Through this study, an optimization of MR images was completed to reduce metal induced artefacts."

name.justification: The study uses mouse models for imaging purposes in a pre-clinical setup.
name.quote: "In this study, a feasibility study using tumours grown in the rectum of the mice..."

name.value: 7T Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) machine with RARE-acquisition sequence
name.justification: The paper discusses optimizing imaging using a 7T MRI machine with a specific acquisition sequence, making it a model used in the study.
name.quote: "The tumours growth and localization were monitored using a 7T Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) machine with RARE-acquisition sequence."

is_contributed.justification: The 7T MRI machine is a common imaging tool in medical research and not specifically introduced by this research.
is_contributed.quote: "The tumours growth and localization were monitored using a 7T Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) machine..."

is_executed.justification: The 7T MRI was actively used to perform imaging in the study.
is_executed.quote: "The mice underwent final imaging to determine the placement of the seeds within the tumours."

is_compared.justification: The study does not compare this model with other imaging systems within the paper.
is_compared.quote: No comparison of imaging methods is mentioned in the provided text.

referenced_paper_title.justification: No specific referenced paper about the use of 7T MRI is mentioned in the given text.

name.justification: This dataset of cancer cells was used to grow tumors in mice for the experimental procedure.
name.quote: "In this orthotopic model, HT-29 colorectal adenocarcinoma cells (1x10^{6} cells/25 μl in Matrigel) were injected..."
